description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Top-down twin-stick undead smashing. Play with one of four different characters, single-player or in co-op with up to four players. Use magic, place traps, launch devastating starfire bombs, power up your hero, and be prepared for challenging boss fights.
description.short: Top-down twin-stick undead smashing. Play with one of four different characters, single-player or in co-op with up to four players. Use magic, place traps, launch devastating starfire bombs, power up your hero, and be prepared for challenging boss fights.
